title: Janna shield+Varus Q question
body: Can i shield him while he charges for him to get the ad bonus or do i have to cast it before he press Q? Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Casting the shield while he's charging will work (Varus' AD is checked at the end, not the start).
End of charging, or when the projectile is hitting?

Upon firing (first option), probably. I think it'd be cleaner on the code end of things.

EDIT: Apparently not? Oh well.

Every damage is calculated as it hits.

I always wait until my ally's AA or skillshot is actually flying towards an enemy champion to 1) avoid telegraphing it and 2) avoid wasting mana if the ADC finally wants to farm instead

So to my knowledge damage is calculated when it hits a target. So you could even shield him when the Arrow is mid-flight. It's the same with cait ultimate. Or Jinx :D.
